original: Kugelberg, Fredrik Wilhelm, disponent, Finspång, f. 14/5/78 i Allhelgona, östergötl. 1., av kapt. Wilhelm Aug. K. o. Helena Cederbaum. G. 09 m. Hann-Marie Berndes. Barn: Hans f. 11, jägmäst.. Norrköp., Claes 13, ci-viling., Södertälje, Brita 14, g. m,’ konstnär Edvin öhrström, Sthlm, Märta 16, g. m. löjtn. A. Skarp, Sundsvall’, EMsialbet 19, g. m. jägmäsit. Lennart Ghriisitoffersison, Norrköp., Karin 22, g. m. löjtn. Göran Dyrssen, Lin-köp. — Linköp. h. a. i. 95, utex. fr. skogsinst. forstmäst :kurs 99. Elev v, Kramfors A-B 95-98, skogsindelare o. assist, v. Holmsunds A-B 00-03, skogl. bitr. v. Kramfors A-B 03-07, skogs-förv. v. A-B Stjernfors-Ställdalen o. A-B Bredsjö Bruk 07-21, skogschef v. Marma-Långrörs A-B 21-23, Fiskeby Fabr. A-B 24-42, verkst. dir. där 42-47. Suppl. i Sv. forstmäst :förb. 08-14, led. av stiftsnd i Linköp. stift, led. av ö^stergötl. 1. skogsv:’styr. RVO 24.
translated: Kugelberg, Fredrik Wilhelm, manager, Finspång, b. 14/5/78 in Allhelgona, Östergötland County, son of Captain Wilhelm Aug. K. and Helena Cederbaum. Married in 1909 to Hann-Marie Berndes. Children: Hans b. 1911, forester in Norrköping, Claes b. 1913, civil engineer in Södertälje, Brita b. 1914, married to artist Edvin Öhrström in Stockholm, Märta b. 1916, married to Lieutenant A. Skarp in Sundsvall, Emilia b. 1919, married to forester Lennart Christoffersson in Norrköping, Karin b. 1922, married to Lieutenant Göran Dyrssen in Linköping. — Moved to Linköping in 1895, graduated from the Forestry Institute's forester course in 1899. Trainee at Kramfors A-B from 1895 to 1898, forestry estimator and assistant at Holmsunds A-B from 1900 to 1903, forestry assistant at Kramfors A-B from 1903 to 1907, forestry manager at A-B Stjernfors-Ställdalen and A-B Bredsjö Bruk from 1907 to 1921, chief forester at Marma-Långrörs A-B from 1921 to 1923, Fiskeby Fabr. A-B from 1924 to 1942, executive director there from 1942 to 1947. Associate member of the Swedish Forestry Association from 1908 to 1914, member of the diocesan board in Linköping Diocese, member of Östergötland County Forest Administration Board. Order of the Royal Vasa 1924.
